A

App - Class in edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.app
The App class is a command-line utility for counting lines of code (LOC) and physical lines in source code files based on user input.

C

countLOC(File) - Static method in class edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.util.LineCounter
Counts the number of lines of code (LOC) in the given file, excluding empty lines and comments.

countPhysicalLines(File) - Method in interface edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.util.LineCounterImpl
